thread.title: Diane
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Diane

author: Diane
title: Diane
text: I received excellent and expedient service from Wil and his team when I was in to purchase two new tires. Wil explained the issues with the old tires, booked my appointments and performed the services in a timely and efficient manner. I was able to work while waiting using their free wifi service! Great customer service! :-)
